title: INDEXES view | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This Information Schema view displays a row for each index defined in the specified (or current) database.
Database to which the hybrid table belongs.
Schema to which the hybrd table belongs.
Name of the hybrid table that the index is over.
Name of the index on the hybrid table.
With YES or NO, indicates whether this index is a unique index.
Name of the constraint that is associated with this index.
Time of creation for this index.
